
// Prologue
## MSG_BATTLE_QUOTE_VALTER_PROLOGUE
[OpenMidLeft][LoadFace_Valter]
I am Valter, Commander of[N]
Grado's Wyvern forces.[A][N]
And you're just a corpse who[N]
does not know he is dead.[A][X]

// Prologue
## MSG_BATTLE_QUOTE_EIRIKA_ONEILL
[OpenMidLeft][LoadFace_ONeill]
Princess Eirika of Renais.[A][N]
By order of the Grado Empire[N]
you are to lay down your arms.[A][N]
[OpenMidLeft][ClearFace]
[OpenMidRight][LoadFace_Eirika]
W-what is this madness?[A][N]
Please, I-I do not wish to fight.[A][N]
[OpenMidRight][ClearFace]
[OpenMidLeft][LoadFace_ONeill]
What you want is irrelevant.[A][N]
Lay down your arms or be[N]
beaten into the dirt.[A][X]

// Prologue
## MSG_BATTLE_QUOTE_SETH_ONEILL
[OpenMidLeft][LoadFace_ONeill]
General Seth.[A][N]
You are instructed by the Grado[N]
Empire to cease resisting.[A][N]
Turn over the Princess and come[N]
with us quietly.[A][N]
[OpenMidLeft][ClearFace]
[OpenMidRight][LoadFace_Seth]
I am her highness's sworn[N]
protector.[A][N]
I will keep my oaths, no matter[N]
who may threaten her![A][X]

// Chapter 01
## MSG_BATTLE_QUOTE_BREGUET
[OpenMidLeft][LoadFace_Breguet]
I'll skin you alive like[N]
I did the soldier before![A][X]
